casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY CASES

2012-1768. In re Resignation of LaCivita.

This matter came on for further consideration upon the filing by respondent, Richard James LaCivita, of a motion for enlargement of time to pay restitution.

Upon consideration thereof, it is ordered by this court that the motion is granted. Respondent, Richard James LaCivita, shall pay Donna Rose restitution in the amount of $27,000 on or before May 16, 2014. If respondent fails to pay said restitution, this court may find respondent in contempt.
